movies.title: Evil Spirit
movies.plot: Mi-ryeong marries Ji-kwang and takes him to live at her mansion. He soon seems to fall ill and he requests that his friend, Yeo-ok be hired on to nurse him. However, Yeo-ok and Ji-kwang are really lovers and together they manage to fake Ji-kwang's death. They next torment Mi-ryeong with visions of his 'ghost'. Mi-ryeong dies of fright and Yeo-ok and Ji-kwang marry--but their happiness is short-lived as their nights are interupted by the vengeful spirit of Mi-ryeong

biography.bio: Ho-won Bae is an actor, known for Evil Spirit (1981).
biography.name: Ho-won Bae

biography.bio: Sok-Yang Choo is an actor, known for The Man with Three Coffins (1987), The Story of Jang-hwa and Heung-ryeon (1956) and On the Eve of Liberation (1961).
biography.name: Sok-Yang Choo

biography.bio: Bong Chu is an actress, known for Jangmibit insaeng (1994), Gagman (1989) and Bie jeojeun ibsul (1974).
biography.name: Bong Chu

biography.bio: Yong-nam Ji is an actor, known for Evil Spirit (1981).

biography.bio: Chu-ryeon Kim is an actor, known for Man on the Roof (1979), Living in a Cell (1975) and Gochubatui yangbaechu (1985).
biography.name: Chu-ryeon Kim

biography.bio: Ha-rim Kim is an actress, known for Ggeol Deok-swi (1989), Bang Kang-soe 3 (1988) and Ggotipieora nakyeobieora (1984).
biography.name: Ha-rim Kim

biography.bio: Min-jeong Kim is an actress, known for Legendary Cave (1978), Twelve Gates of Hell (1980) and Enlightened Buddhist Named Mok-ryeon (1978).
biography.name: Min-jeong Kim

biography.bio: Seong-po Lim is an actor, known for Haneulnaraeseo on pyeonji (1979), Crash Landing (1974) and Three Secret Killers (1976).

biography.bio: Yeong-ran Seo is an actress, known for Manhunt (1978), Duel of the Tough (1982) and Diao nu (1978).
